course_title: Topics In Computer Science: Information Visualization
class_notes: This course focuses on fundamentals of information visualization and visual analytics. The goal is to study techniques for creating effective visual representations of data based on principles from psychology, cognitive science, and design. In addition to designing and developing interactive information visualizations, students will also learn about the state of the art in information visualization research.
sections: Class Nbr: 1298, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 8:30-9:45a, Instructor: E. Wall, Status: Open
